HTTP Address

URLDo not append /api/v0/exec at the end of the URL
Access
Direct = url is used directly from browser Proxy = Grafana backend will proxy the request

Execution constants

This constants can be used in every templating or query. Register your consant name and value and prefix your constant name with "$" in your queries/templating.

example:  $token

{{ key }}{{ val }}
